subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Pedro Alvarez, a third baseman for Vanderbilt, had a stellar high school career in New York. With the first pick overall, the Rays chose the powerful shortstop Tim Beckham.
snippet: Pedro Alvarez, a third baseman for Vanderbilt, had a stellar high school career in New York. With the first pick overall, the Rays chose the powerful shortstop Tim Beckham.
